author: AP
title: Pietrangelo says Blues teammate Bouwmeester in good health
description: Pietrangelo says Blues teammate Bouwmeester in good health
content:
St. Louis Blues captain Alex Pietrangelo says teammate Jay Bouwmeester is in good health some seven weeks after having a cardioverter defibrillator implanted in his chest.
Pietrangelo said he and his teammates have occasionally stopped in to see Bouwmeester … [+1173 chars]
